code.displayName: imbalanced nutrition: Less than body requirements
Chest X-Ray, PA and Lateral Views

item.content: Instructions given for decreased appetite including: Eating salty foods if there are no restrictions. Avoid foods that are too sweet, fattening, greasy. Try to drink clear, warm liquids. Sip through a straw. Eat whenever tolerated. Eat small meals low in fat and eat more often.
